code: import{Platform}from'expo-modules-core';import{getFilename}from'./AssetUris';export function isImageType(type){return /^(jpeg|jpg|gif|png|bmp|webp|heic)$/i.test(type);}export function getImageInfoAsync(url){if(!Platform.isDOMAvailable){return Promise.resolve({name:getFilename(url),width:0,height:0});}return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var img=new Image();img.onerror=reject;img.onload=function(){resolve({name:getFilename(url),width:img.naturalWidth,height:img.naturalHeight});};img.src=url;});}
